com.intland.codebeamer.manager

Interface ProjectRole

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDto, java.security.acl.Group, java.security.Principal, ProjectAwareDto, ReferableDto, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProjectManager.ProjectRoleImpl

    public interface ProjectRole
extends ReferableDto, ProjectAwareDto, java.security.acl.Group
    The management interface of a CodeBeamer project role
    Since:
    CB-6.1.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.base.ReferableDto

        ReferableDto.DescriptionComparator

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ArtifactDto getAttributes()
      Get the role attributes
      int getBitmask()
      Get the project permissions granted via this role as a ProjectPermission bitmask
      java.lang.Integer getId()
      Get the RoleDto id of this project role Note: This id is not the same id than the getAttributes() id
      java.util.List<? extends java.security.Principal> getMembers()
      Get the role members (either UserDto or UserGroup)
      java.util.Set<ProjectPermission> getPermissions()
      Get the project permissions granted via this role
      java.lang.String getTemplate()
      Get the comma-separated list of template role names for this project role
      RoleDto getType()
      Get the RoleDto stereotype of this project role
      java.util.List<UserDto> getUsers()
      Get a list of all distinct users having this project role, either directly (user itself is a member) or indirectly (user is member of a user group that is a member).
      boolean hasPermission(EntityPermission<ProjectDto>... permission)
      Check if this project role grants any of the specified permissions

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.Integer getId()
        Get the RoleDto id of this project role Note: This id is not the same id than the getAttributes() id
        Returns:
        the role id

      • getType

        RoleDto getType()
        Get the RoleDto stereotype of this project role
        Returns:
        role stereotype

      • getAttributes

        ArtifactDto getAttributes()
        Get the role attributes
        Returns:
        the role attributes (read-only)

      • getTemplate

        java.lang.String getTemplate()
        Get the comma-separated list of template role names for this project role
        Returns:
        the comma-separated list of template role names for this project role, or null if this role is not derived from template roles

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(EntityPermission<ProjectDto>... permission)
        Check if this project role grants any of the specified permissions
        Parameters:
        permission - is a variable argument list of project permissions to check
        Returns:
        true if this project role grants any of the specified permissions, false otherwise

      • getBitmask

        int getBitmask()
        Get the project permissions granted via this role as a ProjectPermission bitmask
        Returns:
        the project permissions granted via this role as a bitmask

      • getPermissions

        java.util.Set<ProjectPermission> getPermissions()
        Get the project permissions granted via this role
        Returns:
        the set of project permissions granted via this role (read-only)

      • getMembers

        java.util.List<? extends java.security.Principal> getMembers()
        Get the role members (either UserDto or UserGroup)
        Returns:
        a list of the role members, which can be users and user groups, but no other roles

      • getUsers

        java.util.List<UserDto> getUsers()
        Get a list of all distinct users having this project role, either directly (user itself is a member) or indirectly (user is member of a user group that is a member).
        Returns:
        a List of of all distinct users having this project role, either directly or indirectly
